column2: Dust 1 card from your hand. Make the first Ally you play each turn Efficient.
Dust 1 card from your hand. Gain 1 Enery Coin per Relic you have acquired.
Dust 1 card from your hand. Look at the top card of your deck. You may dust or discard it, then draw 1 card.
Dust 1 card from your hand. Increase your starting hand size to 6 cards.
Dust 1 card from your hand. This Relic shields you from the first attack that would harm you each round.
Dust 1 card frmo your hand. Increase your minimum hand size to 4 cards.
Dust 1 card from your hand. You may play a second Powerful Ally each turn.
Dust 1 card from your hand. Recall 1 card from yoru discard pile.
Dust 1 card from your hand. You may retrieve 1 card with a different name from any cards you dust for Relic effects this turn.
Dust 1 card from your hand. When you acquire this Relic, you may recruit any number of allies that have a total combined cost of 7 or less.
